amendment.description: Amendment maintains proportions of assistance made available for activities and programs in Latin America and the Caribbean region and Asia and the Pacific region.
amendment.purpose: An amendment specifying that the amount of funds authorized funding in any fiscal year for activities and programs in Latin America and the Caribbean region and the Asia and Pacific region should not be reprogrammed to fund other types of assistance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Menendez amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
